summary: Just an retexture for the dwarven armor.
descriptionHtml:
First I'm french so I hope my English will be good enough, and this is my first texture work.
While I was playing skyrim I thought the dwarven armor was too far in color form the dwarven ingot, so I just made a retexture to make some part of the armor more like the ingot.
There is some red instead of the blue of the original armor, but it's just because it's my favorite color, sorry if you don't like it.
author: Hatirelo
